commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Thank you all for gathering here. We have climbed out of the depths of torment to uncover the true identity of the fearsome Mysterious Thief K!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Is it just me, or did this get really dramatic?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Just go with it, Eli... So, Yoshiko, who is Mysterious Thief K?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh heh... The thief is in our midst!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: In our midst? What do you mean?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Let's do it, Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: As we navigate the labyrinth of mysteries that exist in this realm...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: ...we shall uncover the truth.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Even the most nefarious, diabolical plots...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: ...shall crumble to dust in our hands.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko ï¼† Hanayo
commands.line: Let us open the door to truth...together!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Indeed. Our culprit, Mysterious Thief K, is...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: ...you, Kanata!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What? I don't know what you're talking about. This is a false accusation!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Why do you think it's Kanata?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I'll tell you! Hanayo and I told Kanata that "a prop was stolen," but Kanata already knew that it was a tablecloth!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What? That's...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: How did you know that the stolen prop was a tablecloth?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: There's only one possible answer. It's because you stole the tablecloth yourself, Kanata!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Now, come clean with the truth, Mysterious Thief K!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Kanan told me that a tablecloth was missing.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: That's right. I did tell her that a tablecloth was missing, but not that it was stolen.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I don't think that makes Kanata the thief.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hehehe. You sweet, innocent, foolish girls!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: You're sweeter and more innocent than the sweets at Honoka's shop! Yum!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Go on, Hanayo. Hit them with the undeniable proof that'll blast holes in the thief's excuses.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Kanata, you didn't know about a thief until you spoke to us, correct?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah. I don't know anything about it.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Then tell me... Why does the card from Mysterious Thief K smell the same as the miso you used on your grilled rice balls?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It could be just a coincidence. You can find miso anywhere.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: But Kanata, you said it yourself... The miso you used on your grilled rice balls is a homemade blend that you made from scratch. Therefore, that miso can only be yours!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Let's hear what you have to say for yourself!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Giggle*...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Well done, Yohane the famous detective, and Hanayo the assistant. You've cracked this mystery wide open.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It is I, Mysterious Thief K. The "K" stands for Kanata! Did I fool you?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: At last, you admit it!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Kanata! Why did you steal the tablecloth?!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Heh heh heh... I had a very important reason for stealing it.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We all worked together to set up this trick for you, because you two needed to learn how to work as a team!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko ï¼† Hanayo
commands.line: WHAT?!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: As a result, you two used teamwork to uncover the truth.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You both said your lines perfectly just now, too. You sounded like a real detective and assistant!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It's true. I bet your movements on stage will be much better now as well.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: S-So that's what this was all about... I thought it was going a little too smoothly... Oh, I'm so embarrassed!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Don't be embarrassed! You looked really cool, Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: At first I wasn't convinced, but everything went according to Kanata's plan. I really didn't think you'd notice the miso smell.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I think only Hanayo could have noticed that.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: You guys went to so much trouble for us. I'm sorry.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Don't worry about it. We all had a lot of fun!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: If you have this much faith in us, we'll have to meet those expectations! I'll repay you for going to all this trouble by acting well on stage!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: You're now a full-fledged detective and assistant duo! Mysterious Thief K approves! Your musical is going to be a blast.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko ï¼† Hanayo
commands.line: Absolutely!
